Package com.spacecruiser.game.view.GUI

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameHUD
    Represents the in game HUD holding game related information
    GameOver
    Game over screen to save score, points and shields picked and asteroids destroyed.
    GameView
    A view representing the game screen.
    HelpView
    A help view, instructions for the game.
    MainMenu
    A view for the main menu.
    ScreenManager
    A screen manager that manages the screen to be rendered and saves a copy of each screen to avoid creating and destroying java objects (high cost action).
    SettingsMenu
    The HUD to change settings.
    Splash
    Represents the initial splash screen
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ScreenManager.ActiveScreen
    Simulates the different states, each one corresponding to a screen.
